briefdescription.para: functions in that file are wrappers to the newly named functions.

detaileddescription.para: All of them are depreciated, but these wrapper will avoid breaking backward compatibility

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *username, int type, ssh_string publickey)
memberdef.name: ssh_userauth_offer_pubkey

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *username, ssh_string publickey, ssh_private_key privatekey)
memberdef.name: ssh_userauth_pubkey

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *username, const char *filename, const char *passphrase)
memberdef.name: ssh_userauth_privatekey_file

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *address, int port, int *bound_port)
memberdef.name: channel_forward_listen

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, const char *remotehost, int remoteport, const char *sourcehost, int localport)
memberdef.name: channel_open_forward

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, void *dest, uint32_t count, int is_stderr)
memberdef.name: channel_read

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, ssh_buffer buffer, uint32_t count, int is_stderr)
memberdef.name: channel_read_buffer

briefdescription.para: Read data from a channel into a buffer.

parameterdescription.para: The buffer which will get the data.
The count of bytes to be read. If it is bigger than 0, the exact size will be read, else (bytes=0) it will return once anything is available.
A boolean value to mark reading from the stderr stream.

simplesect.para: The number of bytes read, 0 on end of file or SSH_ERROR on error.
This function doesn't work in nonblocking/timeout mode

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, void *dest, uint32_t count, int is_stderr)
memberdef.name: channel_read_nonblocking

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, const char *term, int cols, int rows)
memberdef.name: channel_request_pty_size

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_channel channel, int single_connection, const char *protocol, const char *cookie, int screen_number)
memberdef.name: channel_request_x11

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *filename, int type, const char *passphrase)
memberdef.name: privatekey_from_file

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const char *file, ssh_string pubkey, int type)
memberdef.name: ssh_publickey_to_file
